briefTitle: A Trial of Tadalafil and Glycemic Traits
officialTitle: Phase 3 Randomized Trial of Tadalafil and Glycemic Traits
summary: The purpose of this study is to find out if tadalafil can help overweight and obese people metabolize blood sugar more efficiently. The investigators also want to find out if 20 mg/day of tadalafil for 3 months is safe to take without causing too many side effects. The investigators are plan to enroll 100 subjects at Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Insulin Resistance From Baseline to 3 Months, as Measured by HOMA-IR
